alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 11 at 2:56PM MST until December 13 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Western Kiowa County, Eastern Kiowa County and Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County Counties. * WHEN...From early Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on east to west oriented highways. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County
